title: Happy Birthday Commander Keen!
content:
When I'm writing this message, it's already 14th here.
Billy Blaze is now 21 years old! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-birthday.gif[/img] Happy birthday!
Keen 1 is now 13 years old if I calculated correct (probably not), and still going strong!
Wheee! *drinks glass of cold 7-UP (lemonade)*"For years they studied, collected, catalogued. When they had learned all that they could, they began to modify." 3001: The final Odyssey

title: Re: Happy Birthday Commander Keen!
content:
i second thatas below so above and beyond I imagine.
[img]http://www.angelfire.lycos.com/bug/ir8/manson_1.gif[/img]
Good lord, I hope he doesn't start to drink! *worried*

title: 0x15
content:
Happy Birthday Keen!

Drinking, of course! Perhaps he's sipping a Pan Galactic Gargle Blaster right now...

title: Re: 10101
content: Drinking degrades brain cells and inhibits mental capacity. Unless he's gotten lazy by this time in his life, he'd know that.[url=http://www.screenhog.com]www.screenhog.com[/url]

title: HAoE! Partay!
content:
Happy Anniversary of Existence, Blaze, wherever you are.

He's done a good job of keeping his adventures secret from the world all these years. Hopefully we'll hear how that whole saving the Universe thing went down... apparently it worked, so it oughtta be a great drunken tale--and I'm sure he'll slip up eventually and tell some game developer friend all about it... we can only hope.

>Commander SpleenCave assectatorem Ductoris Alacris

"The irritating notion that the beholder should complete through his imagination what the artist left undone is refuted by the sumi paintings, so fond of incomplete objects. Try to complete the rocks whose base is lost in the mist or to populate the "empty" spaces with more rocks or woods, and you will find that your clumsy moves destroy the delicate balance and thus the meaning."
-Rudolf Arnheim, Parables of Sun Light

JimSoft Lair
http://jimsoftlair.tripod.com/
